title: DDFP 400: Week 8 review & "Hall or Nothing"
itunes:title: DDFP 400: Week 8 review & "Hall or Nothing"
description:
Shek is joined by Handsome Hank and Chris Wesseling to discuss Monday Night Football, their Super Bowl 50 final four predictions and the impact Vernon Davis will have on the Broncos' offense. Then, Shek and Handsome Hank are joined by Ike Taylor and Maurice Jones-Drew to play "Hall or Nothing," debate the "Old Man Power Rankings" and delve into the Steelers-Raiders rivalry.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
